ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a Decision Date is entered when the application status is set to a final status (Approved, Approved with Conditions, or Denied).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Approved with Conditions"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Denied") ), ISBLANK(Decision_Date__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Decision Date is required when status is set to Approved, Approved with Conditions, or Denied.
